hudson.tasks.Shell.command: /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ######################### /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog-server_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/kvm.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog-server_avahi.sh'
